full_content.content: Common reasons your Samsung freezer display is not working
The most common reasons your Samsung freezer display is not working are a malfunctioning electronic control board, bad power supply board or a defective user interface.
We can help! Our service technicians have repaired over
Samsung freezers. We can fix yours no matter where you bought it.
Most common repairs needed to fix a Samsung freezer

When your freezer display is not working, a malfunctioning electronic control board could be causing the problem. The electronic control board receives electrical power from the power cord or power supply board and sends signals to the control panel. When the control panel is dead, a bad electronic control board may not be sending signals or power to the control panel. A bad relay on the circuit board or corrupted internal logic or memory can prevent the electronic control board from working. Have a Sears Home Services Technician examine and repair your freezer display is not working. The technician will perform diagnostic tests on the electronic control board and replace it if it is bad.
How to replace a freezer electronic control board

If the power supply board is bad, the freezer will not power up. The freezer won’t cool and the interior and display lights won’t work. If the freezer is equipped with an electronic door lock, the lock will fail to engage and the door may not close completely. This is because the power supply in a freezer connects the incoming power from your home’s electrical supply to the components inside the freezer. It also sends power from the control board to the freezer. A defective power supply board may also fail to protect the freezer from power surges, potentially causing damage to electronic components like the main control board. If your freezer is not powering up, have a Sears Home Services professional inspect it and replace the power supply board if necessary.

A defective user interface in a freezer won’t allow you to adjust settings in the freezer such as the desired temperature. Communication between the main control board and the user interface will fail, and the settings and status won’t display properly or won't display at all if the user interface stops working. If you suspect a failed user interface, have a Sears Home Services professional inspect the freezer and replace the interface if necessary.
How to replace a freezer user interface
How do I fix a broken Samsung freezer display?
A bad control panel, failed electronic control board or wiring failure can prevent the display from working on your Samsung freezer.
to disconnect electrical power and check the wiring connections on the control panel and the electronic control board.
Here’s a video that shows how to access the electronic control board on the back of a Samsung freezer:
Reconnect any loose wires and repair any broken wires.

Disconnecting electrical power and leaving it off for several minutes and then restoring power will sometimes fix a problem with the freezer display. The electronic control board will reboot and reset.
If the display doesn’t work after restoring power, schedule
and we’ll send a Sears Home Services technician to your home to fix the problem.
What to expect when you experience a Samsung freezer display not working issue
How is the display not working problem fixed?

Correcting most display not working problems usually involves replacing the electronic control board, power supply or user interface. However, there are many potential causes, so a thorough diagnosis is key to fixing the problem. An accurate diagnosis is essential to understanding how much the repair will be.
Sears Home Services recommendations for a freezer display that is not working

When the freezer display is not working it can be for many reasons. To avoid replacing unneeded parts we recommend having a Sears Home Services professional perform diagnostic tests to identify the root cause of the problem. We provide
, and our technicians are experienced at diagnosing and solving all types of freezer issues.
What to look out for with a freezer display not working diagnosis

Diagnosing modern appliances without proper knowledge and training can be difficult. Without using proper diagnostic techniques, fixing your freezer problem will only be achieved through changing parts on a hunch. Appliances, especially in the last 10 years, have become extremely advanced, and many models have electronic parts that are difficult to test. DIY repairs on the latest appliance models are becoming increasingly difficult.

full_content.content: Why isn’t the display on my Samsung freezer working?
Check the power supply, display board, and control board for any issues or malfunctions.
Could a power outage cause the freezer display to stop working?
Yes, a power outage could disrupt the freezer’s display and other functions.
How do I fix a Samsung freezer with a non-working display?
Inspect the power supply, check for blown fuses, and replace any faulty components in the display board.
What causes the display on a freezer to malfunction?
A power issue, blown fuse, or malfunctioning control/display board can cause display issues.

full_content.content: How Do Chest Freezers Work?: 2025 Explanation
Learn how chest freezers work and how to troubleshoot common problems.

A freezer bag is a specially designed plastic bag used for the cold storage of food in the freezer, offering protection against freezer burn and preserving the food's freshness and flavor over extended periods.

A freezer compressor is a vital component of a freezer's refrigeration system, functioning as a pump to circulate refrigerant through the system, which cools the interior by absorbing and expelling heat.
What is a Freezer Door Gasket?
A freezer door gasket is a flexible seal that outlines the edge of the freezer door, ensuring an airtight closure to maintain cold temperatures inside and prevent warm air from entering.
What is a Manual Defrost Freezer?
A manual defrost freezer is an appliance that needs to be switched off and allowed to thaw periodically to remove accumulated ice, ensuring efficient operation and storage space maximization.
Additional possible Samsung freezer symptoms you may experience

full_content.content: You can move the toggle above to the left to opt out of Cookie-based Sales, Sharing, and Targeted Advertising. Please note that your opt-out choice is specific to this website, browser, and device. If you access other Transformco websites, you will need to make your election for each. Also, if you clear your Cookies on this browser or use another browser or device, you may need to opt out again on this website.

Please note: Opting out may affect our ability to personalize your experience on this website, though we may use Cookies that do not include Sales, Sharing, or Targeted Advertising. You may still receive non-personalized advertisements on other sites or personalized ads that may be based on information processed before you opted out.

This website recognizes the Global Privacy Control (“GPC”), which is designed to recognize certain browser-based opt-out preference signals. We will process the GPC signal as a request to opt out. To process your request through GPC, you must use a browser or browser extension that supports the signal and turn it on for each browser and device you use.
